airdrop.hero.title: AESC Ecosystem Launch Airdrop
airdrop.hero.description: Be among the first to claim your stake in the future of agriculture. Join us in sowing the seeds and sharing the harvest!
airdrop.valueProps.title: Why You Shouldn't Miss This Airdrop?
airdrop.valueProps.prop1.title: Early Ecosystem Benefits
airdrop.valueProps.prop1.description: Receive free AESC token allocation as an early member of Agri-Eco Smart Chain and share in the ecosystem's growth rewards.
airdrop.valueProps.prop2.title: Gain Early Access Advantages
airdrop.valueProps.prop2.description: Airdrop participants will receive priority eligibility for early product testing after mainnet launch
airdrop.valueProps.prop3.title: Knowledge & Social Recognition
airdrop.valueProps.prop3.description: Complete knowledge tasks to demonstrate your pioneering role in agritech and earn the exclusive "Early Builder" community badge.
airdrop.timeline.title: Key Campaign Timeline
airdrop.steps.title: How to Participate in the Airdrop (Step-by-Step Guide)
airdrop.steps.step1.title: Airdrop Campaign Design & Task List
airdrop.steps.step1.description: The campaign will be launched on professional airdrop platforms (e.g., Galxe) for automated task verification and point tracking.
airdrop.steps.step1.task1.item4: Subscribe to the official YouTube channel
airdrop.steps.step1.task2.item1: Retweet official Twitter posts and tag 3 friends
airdrop.steps.step1.task2.item2: Introduce yourself in designated Discord channel
airdrop.steps.step1.task3.item1: Post an original tweet / X post about the project (minimum 100 words with image)
airdrop.steps.step1.task3.item2: Create a short video about the project (TikTok / YouTube Shorts)
airdrop.steps.step2.title: Points Ranking & Eligibility Distribution
airdrop.steps.step2.description: After the event ends, only participants with a total score exceeding 100 points will be eligible for the airdrop
airdrop.steps.step2.detail1.label: Event Duration
airdrop.steps.step2.detail2.label: Eligibility Threshold
airdrop.steps.step2.detail3.label: Distribution Mechanism
airdrop.steps.step2.detail3.value: 1 point = 1 token, more work = more rewards
airdrop.steps.step3.title: Token Release Details
airdrop.steps.step3.description: To prevent tokens from being sold immediately after receipt, airdrop tokens will adopt a lock-up + linear release mechanism
airdrop.steps.step3.example: Example: User A receives 6000 airdrop tokens → 1st month after exchange listing: 0 tokens released → Starting from 2nd month, 6 consecutive months, 1000 tokens released per month
airdrop.steps.step4.title: Anti-Cheating & Security Measures
airdrop.steps.step4.description: Key measures to ensure airdrop rewards reach genuine participants
airdrop.steps.step4.measure1.title: Wallet Screening
airdrop.steps.step4.measure1.description: Automated address screening to exclude exchange cold wallets, whale wallets, and addresses suspected of Sybil attacks
airdrop.steps.step4.measure2.title: Task Verification
airdrop.steps.step4.measure2.description: Utilizing airdrop platform APIs to verify genuine task completion and sustained validity throughout the campaign period
airdrop.steps.step4.measure3.title: Manual Review
airdrop.steps.step4.measure3.description: High-point tasks like content creation undergo team review to ensure quality standards
airdrop.cta.title: Don't miss your chance to become part of the AESC founding community!
airdrop.cta.description: Act now, complete the tasks - your early involvement today sows the seeds for tomorrow's rewards.
airdrop.cta.button: Join the Airdrop Now & Claim My Rewards
airdrop.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
airdrop.faq.q1: Is there any fee to participate in the airdrop?
airdrop.faq.a1: Absolutely not! Please be vigilant against any scam messages requesting payment of handling fees or cryptocurrency transfers. The airdrop is completely free.
airdrop.faq.q2: Why are tokens linearly released over 6 months?
airdrop.faq.a2: This rewards long-term community supporters, prevents short-term arbitrage, and ensures the ecosystem's healthy development.
airdrop.faq.q3: Can one user create multiple accounts to participate?
airdrop.faq.a3: No. We conduct Sybil attack screening through wallet addresses, Twitter, and Telegram IDs. Any cheating behavior will result in all related accounts being disqualified.
airdrop.faq.q4: How can I check my points and ranking?
airdrop.faq.a4: After connecting your wallet on the airdrop platform (Galxe/QuestN), you can view your points and ranking in real-time.
airdrop.faq.q5: Can airdropped tokens be transferred or traded?
airdrop.faq.a5: Tokens will be gradually unlocked to your wallet during the release period. Once unlocked, they can be freely transferred and traded.

features.subtitle: Our Focus Areas
features.feature1.title: Smart Agriculture
features.feature1.subtitle: Precision & Sustainability
features.feature1.description: We enhance agricultural resource efficiency and output resilience through IoT, AI models, and data-driven decision-making to address global food security challenges.
features.feature2.title: Blockchain Trust
features.feature2.subtitle: Assetization & Transparency
features.feature2.description: We leverage blockchain to enable trusted data certification, end-to-end supply chain traceability, and transform physical assets like farmland and crops into tradable RWAs.
features.feature3.title: Artificial Intelligence
features.feature3.subtitle: Predictive & Intelligent
features.feature3.description: Leveraging advanced AI engines to deliver pest/disease early-warning, yield prediction, and personalized farming recommendations - unlocking the deeper value of agricultural data.
flagship.title: AGRI-ECO SMART CHAIN
flagship.subtitle: Demonstrating Our Vision & Expertise
flagship.overview.title: Project Profile
flagship.overview.description: AESC is our flagship global AI agricultural big data service platform, aiming to build an agricultural digital ecosystem with "trusted data circulation, precise service delivery, and fair value distribution".
flagship.achievements.title: Key Results
flagship.achievement1.label: AI Pest/Disease Alert Accuracy
flagship.achievement2.label: Yield Increase in Pilot Crops
flagship.achievement3.label: Reduction in Pesticide Usage
flagship.achievement4.label: Lower Financing Costs for Farmers
investmentLogic.title.line1: We firmly believe that technology is the only path
investmentLogic.description: Data silos, lack of financial services, imbalanced value distribution... These long-standing agricultural issues cannot be solved within the old paradigm.
investmentLogic.highlight: BLUEPINE establishes a foundation of trust through blockchain, unlocks data value through AI, and ultimately builds a new-generation digital agricultural ecosystem where every participant—from farmer to consumer—benefits fairly.
about.hero.title: About Us
about.hero.description: We are dedicated to deeply integrating the most advanced technologies into the world's oldest industry, building a more efficient, transparent, and sustainable future for global agriculture.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.description: To become a self-evolving, decentralized cornerstone of the global agricultural digital ecosystem. We firmly believe that technology's ultimate mission is to empower all beings. We are committed to ensuring the value of every piece of land, every agricultural data point, and every participant can be precisely measured and fairly distributed within a soil of trust.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: To systematically drive the innovation and application of blockchain, artificial intelligence, and Web3 technologies in agriculture through strategic investment, technology incubation, and ecosystem development. We seek out and empower disruptive entrepreneurs to collectively solve core challenges like agricultural data silos, insufficient asset liquidity, and fragmented service systems.
about.story.title: Our Origin
about.story.paragraph1: BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION was born from a profound insight: while digital transformation sweeps across the globe, agriculture – the bedrock of civilization – still lags significantly behind in its digital journey. We witnessed the pervasive 'data silos' in the fields, the helplessness of smallholder farmers facing technological and capital barriers, and the value lost due to opacity in supply chains.
about.story.paragraph2: But we saw even greater opportunity. We recognized blockchain's potential to bring unprecedented trust to agriculture, AI's power to unlock the potential of dormant data, and Web3's capacity to create a new paradigm of shared value.
about.story.paragraph3: Thus, BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION came into being. We are not merely a fund, but a collective of practitioners who believe technology can reshape reality. Starting with our flagship project, the Agri-Eco Smart Chain, we are progressively turning this blueprint into reality – connecting wisdom with harvests from the field.
about.advantages.title: Our Unique Advantages
about.advantages.advantage1.title: Deep Industry Integration
about.advantages.advantage1.description: We go beyond financial investment, actively operating our flagship AESC project to deliver highly contextualized technology enablement and implementation support directly within the agricultural sector.
about.advantages.advantage2.title: Cutting-Edge Technical Insight
about.advantages.advantage2.description: Our team possesses world-class technical expertise, enabling precise evaluation of project capabilities while providing crucial developmental guidance.
about.advantages.advantage3.title: Global Ecosystem Network
about.advantages.advantage3.description: Through our extensive connections with agricultural cooperatives, research institutions, exchanges, and financial institutions worldwide, we provide portfolio companies with unparalleled market access and resource integration.
about.advantages.advantage4.title: Long-term Value Co-creation
about.advantages.advantage4.description: We reject short-term arbitrage, embracing long-termism to collaboratively build enduring enterprises that generate tangible value.
about.cta.title: Ready to co-create the future of agriculture with us?
about.cta.description: Whether you are an entrepreneur seeking investment or a potential partner exploring collaboration, we look forward to hearing from you.
strategy.hero.title: Investment Strategy
strategy.hero.description: We focus exclusively on the intersection of agriculture, blockchain, and artificial intelligence, investing in technology-driven companies that are redefining value chains and creating real-world impact.
strategy.pillars.title: Our Three Investment Pillars
strategy.pillars.description: We firmly believe that the convergence of these three domains holds the key to solving agriculture's systemic challenges. Our investment strategy is closely focused on the intersection of:
strategy.pillars.pillar1.title: Digital Leap in Smart Agriculture
strategy.pillars.pillar1.description: Drive revolutionary upgrades in agricultural production methods through the integration of IoT, robotics, and biotechnology.
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area1.name: Agricultural IoT & Robotics
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area1.details: Low-cost sensors, autonomous farming machinery, precision drone operations.
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area2.name: Agricultural Big Data & Analytics Platforms
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area2.details: Farm management software, yield prediction models, carbon sink measurement and monitoring.
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area3.name: Biotechnology & Digital Agriculture Integration
strategy.pillars.pillar1.area3.details: Precision breeding and cultivation solutions based on genetic data.
strategy.pillars.pillar2.title: Blockchain-Powered Trust & Assetization
strategy.pillars.pillar2.description: Leverage blockchain technology to build trust infrastructure in agriculture and achieve digitalization of physical assets
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area1.name: Agricultural RWA
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area1.details: Tokenization of physical assets like farmland, crop profit rights, and agricultural equipment.
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area2.name: Supply Chain Traceability & Transparency
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area2.details: Verifiable end-to-end data records from farm to table.
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area3.name: Agricultural DeFi & Insurance
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area3.details: Credit scoring based on on-chain data, decentralized insurance, yield derivatives.
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area4.name: Decentralized Data Marketplace
strategy.pillars.pillar2.area4.details: A platform enabling secure, compliant, and compensated circulation of agricultural data.
strategy.pillars.pillar3.title: AI-Enabled Decision Making & Automation
strategy.pillars.pillar3.description: Utilize artificial intelligence and computer vision to enhance the precision and automation level of agricultural decisions
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area1.name: AI Predictive Models
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area1.details: Early pest/disease identification and warning, market price forecasting, meteorological risk modeling.
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area2.name: Computer Vision Applications
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area2.details: Crop growth and stress analysis using satellite, drone, and ground imagery.
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area3.name: Intelligent Decision Support Systems
strategy.pillars.pillar3.area3.details: Provide farmers with personalized irrigation, fertilization, and planting prescriptions.
strategy.criteria.title: Investment Stages & Criteria
strategy.criteria.stages.title: Stages We Invest In
strategy.criteria.stages.stage1.title: Seed & Series A
strategy.criteria.stages.stage1.descript: We primarily invest in innovative companies at early and growth stages.
strategy.criteria.stages.stage2.title: Selective Series B Follow-on
strategy.criteria.stages.stage2.descript: We provide continued support for exceptional projects with strategic importance to our ecosystem.
strategy.criteria.stages.amount.title: Investment Scale
strategy.criteria.looking.title: What We Look For
strategy.criteria.criterion1.title: Strong Team
strategy.criteria.criterion1.description: Founders with deep technical expertise and proven execution capability in agriculture.
strategy.criteria.criterion2.title: Clear Value Proposition
strategy.criteria.criterion2.description: Solutions that directly address the core industry pain points we focus on
strategy.criteria.criterion3.title: Verifiable Technology Edge
strategy.criteria.criterion3.description: Products/services with defensible technical barriers and quantifiable results.
strategy.criteria.criterion4.title: Scalability Potential
strategy.criteria.criterion4.description: Potential and clear pathway to expand from pilot projects to global markets.
strategy.criteria.criterion5.title: Ecosystem Synergy
strategy.criteria.criterion5.description: Ability to generate collaborative value with the BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION ecosystem, particularly the AESC platform.
strategy.postInvestment.title: Beyond Capital: Our Commitment to Value Co-Creation
strategy.postInvestment.description: We provide comprehensive strategic support to our portfolio companies, accelerating growth together.
strategy.postInvestment.service1.title: Technology Enablement & Integration
strategy.postInvestment.service1.descrip: Provide technical integration support with the AESC platform, share our AI models and blockchain infrastructure, and assist with technology architecture optimization.
strategy.postInvestment.service2.title: Ecosystem Resources & Network
strategy.postInvestment.service2.descrip: Connect with global agricultural cooperatives, large agribusinesses, research institutions, and potential clients to help projects achieve rapid commercialization and market expansion.
strategy.postInvestment.service3.title: Token Economics & Financial Modeling
strategy.postInvestment.service3.descrip: Provide top-tier expert advisory for projects requiring token economic model design, and facilitate connections with exchanges, market makers, and other premier financial resources.
strategy.postInvestment.service4.title: Global Compliance & Strategy
strategy.postInvestment.service4.descrip: Deliver compliance advisory and strategic navigation in key global markets, particularly in pioneering jurisdictions for RWA and cryptocurrency regulations.
strategy.process.title: From Initial Contact to Partnership
strategy.process.step1.title: Initial Contact
strategy.process.step1.description: Submit your project summary via our official website form.
strategy.process.step2.title: Preliminary Screening
strategy.process.step2.description: Internal team review with initial feedback provided within two weeks.
strategy.process.step3.title: In-Depth Due Diligence
strategy.process.step3.description: For qualified projects, we initiate comprehensive due diligence covering technology, market, financials, and team.
strategy.process.step4.title: Investment Committee Decision
strategy.process.step4.description: Due diligence reports are submitted to our Investment Committee for final decision.
strategy.process.step5.title: Agreement & Closing
strategy.process.step5.description: Reach investment agreement, execute documents, and complete capital transfer.
strategy.process.step6.title: Post-Investment Value Co-creation
strategy.process.step6.description: Launch comprehensive post-investment support program for mutual growth.
strategy.cta.title: Is Your Project Defining the Future of Agriculture?
strategy.cta.description: If your team shares our vision and is building next-generation agricultural technology solutions, we welcome your application.

ecosystem.hero.title: Ecosystem Partnership
ecosystem.hero.description: Go Far, Together. We are committed to building an open, collaborative, and mutually-beneficial global digital agriculture ecosystem. We invite you to join us in collectively empowering the future of farming.
ecosystem.journey.title: Begin Our Collaboration Journey
ecosystem.journey.description: Wherever you are in the value chain, if you share our vision, we welcome you to reach out. Our Partnership Development Team will provide you with a dedicated communication channel.
ecosystem.partners.title: Partnering with Global Leaders, Building a Complete Value Chain
ecosystem.partners.description: We work closely with leading organizations across different sectors to jointly address complex challenges and unlock the full potential of the ecosystem.
ecosystem.partners.category1.title: Research & Academic Institutions
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction1: Jointly conduct cutting-edge research on agricultural AI models and blockchain protocols.
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction2: Collaborate on field trials and data validation to accelerate the commercialization of technological achievements.
ecosystem.partners.category1.direction3: Co-cultivate interdisciplinary talent with knowledge spanning both agriculture and technology.
ecosystem.partners.category2.title: Agricultural Enterprises & Cooperatives
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction1: Serve as pilot sites and distribution channels for implementing and promoting AESC platform technologies and services.
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction2: Provide authentic industry insights and demands to guide product development direction.
ecosystem.partners.category2.direction3: Co-develop blockchain-based traceability solutions and brand enhancement strategies for green agricultural products.
ecosystem.partners.category3.title: Technology & Platform Partners
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction1: IoT Device Manufacturers: Co-develop low-cost, high-reliability agricultural sensing equipment.
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction2: Cloud Service Providers: Optimize underlying computing power and storage infrastructure.
ecosystem.partners.category3.direction3: Data Providers: Integrate diverse datasets such as meteorological, remote sensing, and market data.
ecosystem.partners.category4.title: Financial Institutions & Nodes
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction1: Exchanges: Jointly promote liquidity for AESC and related RWA assets.
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction2: Custodians & Auditors: Ensure asset security and compliance.
ecosystem.partners.category4.direction3: Traditional Financial Institutions: Co-design structured financial products to channel traditional capital into the agricultural Web3 ecosystem.

ecosystem.forms.form1.title: Technology Integration & Co-Development
ecosystem.forms.form1.target: Technology Companies, Developer Teams, Research Labs
ecosystem.forms.form1.content1: Develop DApps based on the Agri-Eco Smart Chain public blockchain or platform APIs
ecosystem.forms.form1.content2: Co-build core modules (e.g., carbon sink measurement, AI models)
ecosystem.forms.form1.content3: Become a validator node for the Agri-Eco Smart Chain public blockchain
ecosystem.forms.form2.title: Market Expansion & Pilot Deployment
ecosystem.forms.form2.target: Large Agribusinesses, Agricultural Cooperatives, Local Governments, Agricultural Input Distributors
ecosystem.forms.form2.content1: Deploy and promote AESC solutions within your production regions or customer networks
ecosystem.forms.form2.content2: Jointly apply for government digital agriculture projects
ecosystem.forms.form2.content3: Become a regional equipment service and operational center
ecosystem.forms.form3.title: Capital Collaboration & Ecosystem Investment
ecosystem.forms.form3.target: Venture Capital Funds, Family Offices, Corporate Venture Capital Departments
ecosystem.forms.form3.content1: Co-invest in high-quality agricultural technology projects
ecosystem.forms.form3.content2: Share deal flow and due diligence information
ecosystem.forms.form3.content3: Jointly establish specialized funds focused on Agricultural Web3

insights.hero.title: Insights
insights.hero.description: Delve into industry frontiers and decode technological trends. Here we share in-depth perspectives, cutting-edge analysis, and evidence-based cases on the digital transformation of agriculture.
insights.valueProposition.title: From Information to Insight: Empowering Your Decisions
insights.valueProposition.quote: The digital wave is sweeping through global agriculture, but amidst the noise, clear insight is paramount. BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION is not just a practitioner but also a thinker. We are committed to dissecting the noise and complexity, transforming intricate technology, policy, and market dynamics into clear, credible, and actionable industry intelligence. This provides solid support for your strategic positioning in the new agricultural era.

aesc.valueProposition.title: Become the Architect of the Agricultural Digital Revolution
aesc.valueProposition.subtitle: Why Invest in AESC
aesc.valueProposition.prop1.title: Real World Value
aesc.valueProposition.prop1.description: Our technology has been field-proven to generate measurable economic returns.
aesc.valueProposition.prop2.title: Cutting-Edge Technology Integration
aesc.valueProposition.prop2.description: A revolutionary architecture combining semantic blockchain and federated learning ensures both high performance and privacy protection.
aesc.valueProposition.prop3.title: Massive Ecosystem Potential
aesc.valueProposition.prop3.description: Join early to share in the tremendous dividends of global agricultural digital transformation.
aesc.participation.title: How to Participate in the AESC Ecosystem
aesc.participation.subtitle: Start Your Agricultural Digital Investment Journey in 3 Steps
aesc.participation.step1.title: Become an Owner
aesc.participation.step1.subtitle: Participate in the AESC Initial Token Offering
aesc.participation.step1.content: Purchase AESC tokens to obtain foundational ecosystem rights. This is the gateway to all ecosystem activities.
aesc.participation.step2.title: Experience and Use
aesc.participation.step2.subtitle: Use AESC Tokens
aesc.participation.step2.content: Utilize your tokens within our live ecosystem applications
aesc.participation.step3.title: Deeper Engagement & Rewards
aesc.participation.step3.subtitle: Staking, Governance & Co-Building
aesc.participation.step3.content: Earn yields through staking, participate in community governance, and share in the ecosystem's growth
aesc.tokenEconomy.title1: Core Overview of the Token Economic Model
aesc.tokenEconomy.subtitle1: A multi-dimensional allocation structure balancing liquidity and long-term value
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation2.unlock: 10% unlocked at TGE, remainder unlocks linearly over 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation3.unlock: 10% unlocked at TGE, remainder unlocks linearly over 18 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation4.unlock: 50% unlocked at TGE for market making, remainder unlocks linearly over 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation5.unlock: Unlocking amount decided by community vote, for risk response and emergency subsidies
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation6.unlock: Unlocked based on partnership progress, up to 12 months
aesc.tokenEconomy.allocation7.unlock: Released linearly over 6 months after completing tasks
aesc.tokenEconomy.title2: AESC: The Lifeblood of Ecosystem Value
aesc.tokenEconomy.subtitle2: Multi-dimensional utility design driving ecosystem value circulation
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility1.title: Payment & Consumption
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility1.description: Payment for data services, paid knowledge content, and DeFi transaction fees.
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility2.title: Incentives & Rewards
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility2.description: Rewarding data contributors, content creators, and community promoters.
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility3.title: Staking & Governance
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility3.description: Stake tokens to share platform revenue and vote on ecosystem development direction.
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility4.title: Asset Anchoring
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility4.description: Serves as the pricing and trading unit for agricultural RWA assets.
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility5.title: Deflationary Burning
aesc.tokenEconomy.utility5.description: A portion of platform revenue is used for buyback and burn, driving value appreciation.

aesc.roadmap.title: AESC Ecosystem Development Journey
aesc.roadmap.phase1.title: Complete team assembly, finalize technical architecture, publish whitepaper
aesc.roadmap.phase1.milestone: Reach pilot cooperation intentions with 2 agricultural regions
aesc.roadmap.phase2.title: Initiate AESC airdrop and private token sale
aesc.roadmap.phase2.milestone: Reach 150,000 global active users participating in the airdrop and token sale
aesc.roadmap.phase3.title: Deploy core platform, integrate IoT devices, test AI models
aesc.roadmap.phase3.milestone: 500 farming households in internal testing, AI diagnostic accuracy ≥85%
aesc.roadmap.phase4.title: Launch DeFi lending products / RWA issuance
aesc.roadmap.phase4.milestone: Expand coverage to 5 countries, achieve $500 million in RWA asset scale
aesc.roadmap.phase5.title: Agri-Eco Smart Chain Testnet deployment, Developer ecosystem building
aesc.roadmap.phase5.milestone: Ecosystem Fund grants awarded to 30 projects
aesc.roadmap.phase6.title: Mainnet Launch, Ecosystem Migration, Carbon Credit Chain Activation
aesc.roadmap.phase6.milestone: 100 On-Chain Nodes, $100M Carbon Credit Trading Volume
aesc.roadmap.phase7.title: Global Standard Setting, Deepen International Cooperation, Ecosystem Prosperity
aesc.roadmap.phase7.milestone: 100+ Ecosystem Projects, AESC Market Cap Ranked Top 50 in the Sector
aesc.trust.title: Secure, Transparent, Trustworthy
aesc.trust.audit.title: Smart Contract Audit
aesc.trust.audit.description: The AESC token contract and core ecosystem contracts have been thoroughly audited by [leading security firm] CertiK.
aesc.trust.docs.title: Official Documentation
aesc.trust.privacy.title: Data Privacy Protection
aesc.trust.privacy.description: Utilizing Federated Learning and Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP) to ensure user data remains usable but invisible on-chain, compliant with GDPR and global data protection regulations
aesc.trust.governance.title: Transparent Governance
aesc.trust.governance.description: All major decisions undergo community voting with immutable on-chain recording. Token release and utilization are publicly verifiable in real-time

aesc2.hero.description: Welcome to the future of agriculture. Here, every contribution is recognized and every value can circulate.

aesc2.guide.title: Start Your AESC Journey in Three Steps
aesc2.guide.step1.title: Create Identity
aesc2.guide.step1.description: Enter AESC official DAPP, generate your decentralized identity (DID). This is your universal passport in the ecosystem
aesc2.guide.step2.title: Get AESC
aesc2.guide.step2.description: Acquire AESC tokens, the fuel driving all ecosystem activities. You can purchase through exchanges
aesc2.guide.step3.title: Explore & Participate
aesc2.guide.step3.description: Connect your wallet and start exploring DApps. We recommend the best starting points based on your identity

aesc2.testimonials.title: They Are Creating Value in the AESC Ecosystem
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial1.name: Zhang Wei
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial1.content: By uploading my farmland data through AgriData Hub, I earn stable AESC token rewards every month. I used these tokens to learn new techniques on AgriExpert, and my yield increased by 20%
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial2.name: Dr. Li Ming
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial2.content: I share agricultural pest and disease recognition models on the AgriExpert platform, serving thousands of farmers and earning significant income. AESC truly makes knowledge valuable
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial3.name: Maria Santos
aesc2.testimonials.testimonial3.content: After using TraceChain to provide traceability proof for my organic vegetables, product prices increased by 30%. Consumers can now scan QR codes to see the entire process from planting to shipping
aesc2.developer.title: Building the Next Breakthrough DApp for the Ecosystem?
aesc2.developer.description: We provide developers with comprehensive infrastructure to help you build and deploy quickly
aesc.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
aesc.faq.subtitle: Questions you may want to know
aesc.faq.q1: How can I participate in the AESC private sale?
aesc.faq.a1: Ensure you have a compatible BSC wallet, visit our official private sale platform, and follow the instructions to complete payment.
aesc.faq.q2: What is the token unlock schedule?
aesc.faq.a2: Please refer to Section 8.2 of our whitepaper for detailed unlock timelines for different allocation portions.
aesc.faq.q3: Which currencies can I use to purchase AESC?
aesc.faq.a3: We accept USDT (BEP-20). Please check the private sale platform announcements for specific details.
aesc.faq.q4: What supports the value of AESC tokens?
aesc.faq.a4: The value of AESC tokens is derived from real utility demand within the ecosystem, including data service payments, staking reward sharing, and governance rights.
aesc.faq.a5: The AESC smart contract has undergone a comprehensive audit by CertiK. Team identities are publicly verifiable, and project milestones are regularly disclosed.
aesc.faq.cta.title: Become a Founder of the Agricultural Digital Revolution
aesc.faq.cta.description: By joining now, you're not just investing in a token – you're investing in a more efficient, fair, and sustainable agricultural future.
aesc.faq.cta.button: Join the AESC Private Sale Now - Shape the Future Together
contact.form.title: Send Us a Message
contact.form.subtitle: Complete the form below and we'll contact you shortly
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.companyPlaceholder: Please enter your company or organization name
contact.form.subject: Subject
contact.form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or needs in detail
contact.form.fileHint: Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX formats, maximum 10MB
contact.form.success: Submission successful, we will contact you as soon as possible!
apply.header.title: Project Application Form
apply.header.description: Thank you for considering partnering with BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION. This application form is designed to efficiently gather a comprehensive overview of your project. We are committed to keeping all information strictly confidential.
apply.success.title: Thank You for Your Submission!
apply.success.description: We have received your application. Our investment team will complete the preliminary review within 2 weeks. If the project aligns with our investment direction, we will contact you through the contact information you provided.
apply.section1.title: Part 1: Basic Project Information
apply.section1.taglinePlaceholder: Please clearly describe the core value of your project in one sentence
apply.section1.logoHint: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, SVG. Max 2MB
apply.section1.coreField1: Smart Agriculture (IoT, Robotics, Big Data Platforms)
apply.section1.coreField2: Blockchain Trust (Supply Chain Traceability, RWA, RDA, DeFi, Data Marketplace)
apply.section1.coreField3: Artificial Intelligence (AI Models, Computer Vision, Predictive Analytics)
apply.section1.tracks: Specific Focus Areas / Tags (Multiple selections allowed)
apply.section2.title: Part 2: Team Information
apply.section2.bioPlaceholder: Brief Introduction* (1-2 sentences describing their background, past achievements, and role in the project)
apply.section3.title: Part 3: Product & Technology
apply.section3.painPointPlaceholder: Please clearly describe the specific problems you aim to solve and the current challenges faced by your target users/customers
apply.section3.solutionPlaceholder: Please provide a detailed introduction to your product/service, explaining how it works and its unique aspects
apply.section3.technologyPlaceholder: Please specify the core technologies used in the project (e.g., public blockchain, consensus mechanism, AI framework, etc.) and elaborate on the technical barriers or innovations
apply.section3.aescSynergyPlaceholder: Does your project plan to, or has it already, integrated with the AGRI-ECO SMART CHAIN? What potential synergies could arise at the data, technology, user, or asset levels?
apply.section4.title: Part 4: Market & Progress
apply.section4.targetMarketPlaceholder: Please describe the geographic regions you serve, specific customer types (e.g., smallholder farmers, large agribusinesses, buyers), and estimated market size
apply.section4.competitionPlaceholder: List key competitors and clearly explain your core competitive advantages
apply.section4.milestonesPlaceholder: Examples: pilot farmland area, user count, monthly active users, transaction volume, revenue, data volume, etc. Please provide quantifiable data where possible
apply.section5.title: Part 5: Business Model & Funding
apply.section5.businessModelPlaceholder: Please clearly describe your revenue sources (e.g., subscription fees, transaction fees, service fees, etc.)
apply.section5.fundingAmountPlaceholder: Target funding amount for this round
apply.section5.fundingUsePlaceholder: Please describe the main allocation of the raised funds
apply.section6.title: Part 6: Material Submission
apply.section6.businessPlanHint: Supported formats: PDF, PPT, Word. Max 10MB
apply.section6.demoLinkPlaceholder: Can be website link, demo video, etc.
apply.section7.title: Part 7: How You Found Us
apply.section7.source: How did you hear about BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION? (Optional)
apply.section8.title: Part 8: Consent & Submission
apply.section8.confirmAccurate: I confirm that all information provided above is true and accurate
apply.section8.confirmPrivacy: I understand and agree that BLUEPINE TECH FOUNDATION will process the submitted information in accordance with its Privacy Policy for investment evaluation purposes
